name: Mercedes-Benz S-Class
description: The epitome of automotive luxury. The S-Class offers unparalleled comfort with its handcrafted interior, whisper-quiet cabin, and advanced climate control systems.

name: Mercedes-Benz E-Class
description: Sophisticated elegance meets everyday practicality. Perfect for corporate transfers and airport journeys with ample space and refined comfort.

name: BMW 7 Series
description: Dynamic luxury with cutting-edge technology. The 7 Series combines sporting character with supreme comfort for discerning passengers.

name: Range Rover Autobiography
description: Commanding presence with unmatched versatility. Ideal for those requiring elevated ground clearance without compromising on luxury.

name: Mercedes-Benz V-Class
description: Spacious luxury for groups and families. The V-Class offers first-class travel for up to six passengers with generous luggage capacity.

name: Rolls-Royce Phantom
description: The pinnacle of automotive excellence. Reserved for the most prestigious occasions where nothing but absolute perfection will suffice.
